page.title: 09Pear Tree Farm
page.content: Our farm is called Pear Tree Farm.It has been in our family for years but the people who had it before rented it.We have 32 hectares of land.Up the main road we rent 16 hectares.The farm house is by it.We have 4 rams and about 80 sheep.We have Texel sheep or Leicester. We have Friesian heifer cows.We used to have nearly 100 cows.We have 5 horses as well.We make our own hay,but we have to go to a place called Soldern to get our straw.We have 2 tractors.One is about 30 years old and is called a Fordson Super Major.The other tractor is about 12 years old and is a Ford 4000.We use a New Holland rectangle baler.We have also a mower and a hay tedder.On the Fordson Super Major it has a fork lift for moving manure.We have also 2 muck spreaders.
